attributes.action: do not extend the 1967 abortion act to northern ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: as a skilled helper and volunteer with life n.i. i oppose the extension of the 1967 abortion act to n. ireland.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence:
   
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Anti-Abortion/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
